body.name: Baby Trend Sit N Stand Double Stroller 2.0 DLX with 5 Point Safety Harness, Canopy, Extra Basket, 2 Cup Holders and Covered Compartment, Modern Khak
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 21 - 23. Order within 9 hrs 58 mins.
features: Children can sit in the front and rear seats of the stroller or stand on the rear platform, this stroller is compatible with Baby Trend car seats; Maximum weight capacity recommendation is 50 pounds
Stroller is equipped with a 5-point safety harness to ensure maximum security for your child; Safety harness securely holds your child in place within the stroller
Features 2 panels with fully ratcheting canopies on the front seat and a fixed canopy with a visor for sun protection; Product Dimensions (L x W x H): 22.63 x 49.25 x 43
One-hand compact hold for easy transport; Removable rear seat converts stroller to bench and standing mode for easy carry and storage; Folded dimensions (L x W x H): 22.63 x 34.00 x 16 inches
Comes with a covered parent tray with 2 cup holders, covered compartment, and an extra-large basket for added storage giving you ample space to store essentials of your baby such as diapers and toys
body.description: The Baby Trend Sit N' Stand Double Stroller 2.0 DLX with a 5-Point Harness offers an ideal solution for your baby's travel system needs. This multi-functional double stroller is designed to adapt as your child grows, making it a long-lasting investment. It can also be used with a Baby trend car seat. It comfortably accommodates two children, with the front seat suitable for infants and the rear seat easily transforming into a standing platform for older children. This convertible baby stroller maximizes convenience for parents on the go while ensuring your children's comfort and safety through its sturdy 5-point harness. Navigating crowded places is a breeze thanks to its compact design. It features a covered compartment and an extra-large basket, providing ample storage for all your baby essentials. This travel stroller guarantees a smooth and comfortable ride for your little ones, making it an excellent choice for newborns to toddlers. The Modern Khaki color adds a stylish touch to this stroller, while the canopy ensures effective protection from the sun and rain. Its lightweight design makes the Baby Trend Stroller an ideal travel stroller for airplanes. This versatile double stroller is the practical choice for modern parents, serving as an essential item for families with young children, especially during vacations. Don't miss the opportunity to enhance your travel experience with your little ones. Order the Baby Trend Sit N' Stand Double Stroller 2.0 DLX with a 5-Point Harness in Modern Khaki today!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Baby Trend Sit N' Stand Double Stroller 2.0 DLX Streamlined, single front wheels allow for an easy push and a more compact footprint for the new Sit N' Stand Double 2.0. Your two will stroll in quality, comfort and style with this redesigned favorite of growing families. The Sit 'N Stand combines maximum comfort and safety with sleek style and will make your trip to the park easy and enjoyable. Both seats have a 5-point safety harness for maximum security. The front seat has a removable 2 panel fully ratcheting canopy and the rear seat has a fixed canopy to block the sun. This Stroller also includes a hassle free one-hand fold, an extra-large basket for all your travel necessities and a parent console with two cup holders and cell phone holder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hard to access bottom storage
reviews.reviewText: This is a great stroller, very sturdy and fits my kids with room to grow. However it is difficult to steer, it kind of just veers off in whatever direction it wants to and to correct if you have to put a lot of muscle into it. We took it to the aquarium in Monterey and my arms definitely got a workout. The basket storage on the bottom is very large but it’s difficult to get a diaper bag in it. I have the fawn design large diaper bag and it did not fit. I also have the mini fawn diaper bag and it fit well hanging off the handlebar but if the child in front gets out the stroller will tip back. We had to make sure to move the diaper bag to the front seat when our daughter got out of the front seat.
